mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Harris, Thomas Maley to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Harris, Thomas Maley
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov. F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 4 1862. By Telegraph from Bulltown 4 1862. Lieut Hebener has seventy recruits for a cavalry company wants assurance it will be accepted if filled up to the required number Please answer TM Harris Col 10th Va 24D77pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Harris, Thomas Maley
Bulltown, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
